description:
Special Rates for February!!!

You’ll love my place because it's large enough to spread out yet has a cozy feel.  My place is good for small groups, couples, and families. 

Up to 5 people can sleep comfortably -The front Bedroom/living room combination has a bed, a futon, an air conditioner, and TV. The back bedroom has a bed, AC, and TV also.

The eat-in kitchen is fully equipped.
 





It's the ground floor apartment.  No stairs!!!

Brooklyn has a lot to offer. You will enjoy local cafes & restaurants, bakeries, markets, and other businesses that reflect the area’s diversity and that are all in walking distance! Your apartment is easily accessible to JFK airport, the Barclay Center, and Brooklyn Bridge Park. The nearby subway can quickly get you to the best shopping, restaurants, or other sites of Manhattan or Brooklyn.

We are literally a 1-minute walk to the A/C subway stop at Nostrand Avenue and less than 1 hour from JFK via public transportation.  The express "A" train can have you in downtown Manhattan in 10 minutes and Times Square in 30.
name: Home away from Home
